meanings.definition: A red synthetic dye used in biological staining.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used safranine to color the cells for the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The safranine dye gave a vibrant red color to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student accidentally spilled safranine on the lab coat, turning it bright red.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed with embarrassment, resembling the intense hue of safranine.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with shades of safranine, creating a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: A red crystalline compound used as a dye and biological stain.
meanings.sent1: The safranine compound was carefully added to the solution for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed safranine with other colors to achieve the perfect shade of red.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly thought safranine was a new exotic spice and added it to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The love letter was written with words dipped in safranine, symbolizing passion.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with flowers in various hues, but none as striking as safranine.
